# hyperping_incident_update (Resource)

Manages an update to a Hyperping incident. Use this to add status updates to an incident timeline.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `incident_id` (String) The UUID of the incident to add the update to.
- `text` (String) The text content of the update (English).
- `type` (String) The type of update. Valid values: `investigating`, `identified`, `update`, `monitoring`, `resolved`.

### Optional

- `date` (String) The date of the update in ISO 8601 format. If not provided, the current time is used.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the update (format: incident_id/update_id).
